title: S8E17 – "Piercing the Veil" – Scary Stories Told in the Dark
description:
In this episode of Scary Stories Told in the Dark, we bring you four spine-chilling tales from author N.M. Brown, performed by host and narrator Otis Jiry, about pernicious playthings, malevolent meats, dark doorways, and odious occupations.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
